title: Does TikTok show people my phone number? - Quora

response.answer_text: Alright so Tiktok doesn’t show your personal info but it does ask for contact info as in the question “does is show my phone number” it asks for it so you can directly message people, but you can always choose to remove your phone number or if you do put your phone number in you can always block other users or report other users. You are always given the choice to change the setting.For example to make your account private but that’s your choice Thank you for asking this fabulous question. If you have any other question about Tiktok you can always ask and i shall always try and answer your wonderful interesting questions

You must be aware that Like Whatsapp and many other similar apps, TikTok needs your phone number for registration. Without which you won’t be able to create an active account on TikTok. Your username is generated via the phone number, although the TikTok accounts are public by default you have the option to edit your privacy and it is not necessary that your phone number is displayed to others.
